comment.body:
ZeroNet, for Me, is all about running my website with no cost.
Imagine a talented kid in Africa who gets the chance to show their capacity at an early age. The world would find talents much faster.

> [flappyearz](#comment_2_1QEfmMwKVxgR4rkREbdJYjgUmF3Zy8pwHt): Well technically you are running your website on others' expense, using their bandwidth and disk storage space. At least this is not a scam convincing you to lease your storage in exchange of valuable malware using you as a spam zombie.
> Which reminds me: when will we get spammers abusing the net?

I don't get your point, would you explain what you mean?
